name: Gabriel Angelfire
originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, first strike, trample, or rampage 3. Gabriel Angelfire gains that ability until your next upkeep.

rulings.text: Gabriel Angelfire will have the ability it gains through your next untap step, but will no longer have it during your next upkeep step.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose flying, first strike, trample, or rampage 3. Gabriel Angelfire gains that ability until your next upkeep. (Whenever a creature with rampage 3 becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
